mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWIDTOCHAR(ROWID) RID, ROWNUM RNUM, 'N' ROWSTAT, orgQuery.* FROM ( SELECT (SUBSTR(REPORT_DATE, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(REPORT_DATE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(REPORT_DATE, 7, 2)) REPORT_DATE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE EFF_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND (CODE_TP = 'IN000' OR CODE_TP = 'EX000') AND CODE_CD = CATEGORY1) CATEGORY1, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE EFF_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND (CODE_TP = CATEGORY1) AND CODE_CD = CATEGORY2) CATEGORY2, REPORT_DESC, INCOME, INCOMER, EXPENSE, EXPENSER, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE EFF_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND (CODE_TP = 'MD000') AND CODE_CD = INOUT_METHOD) INOUT_METHOD, INST_USER, TO_CHAR(INST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INST_DATE, UPD_USER, TO_CHAR(UPD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPD_DATE FROM INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT ORDER BY ${sidx} ${sord}) orgQuery ) gridQuery WHERE gridQuery.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT ( REPORT_DATE , CATEGORY1 , CATEGORY2 , REPORT_DESC , INCOME , INCOMER , EXPENSE , EXPENSER , INOUT_METHOD , INST_USER , INST_DATE , UPD_USER , UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( '20150802' , 'IN003' , NULL , '김광민 여행비' , 30000 , '김광민' , NULL , NULL , 'MD001' , '이창희' , SYSDATE , '이창희' , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT INCOMER NAME, SUM(INCOME) / 10000 COUNT FROM INCOME_EXPENSE_REPORT WHERE CATEGORY1 = 'IN002' AND REPORT_DATE BETWEEN DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM'), '01', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - 1 || '03' , '02', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') - 1 || '03' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '03') AND DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM'), '01', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '02' , '02', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '02' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') + 1 || '02') AND INCOMER IN (SELECT NAME FROM MEMBER_MT) GROUP BY INCOMER ORDER BY NAME ASC
